MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH10 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:56am. Repairs are taking longer than expected as our team have established an underground cable fault and are now awaiting a digging team to arrive on site. We are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:56am on Thursday, 7th January 2021.
